* The Greek team got it's first <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/processes/newmember|Ubuntu member]]</nowiki>! Congrats <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/~simosx|simosx]]</nowiki>
* Translated the <nowiki>[[http://www.swaroopch.com/notes/Python_el:Table_of_Contents|"A Byte of Python" book in Greek]]</nowiki> and started <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-gr.org/viewforum.php?f=55|online python programming classes]]</nowiki> through our forum and irc channel.
